name: Zenith Elevation Thompson Table
descr:
Our Zenith Thompson Tables are acclaimed to be one of the finest tables available. This elevation-series model has all four drops (air powered) as standard features.

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty
Tilt Headpiece
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser
Soft Hinged Dorsal
Terminal Point Dorsal Drop - Pneumatic
Terminal Point Abdominal Drop - Pneumatic
Slide & Crank Pelvic
Terminal Point Pelvic 3-way Drop - Pneumatic
Adjustable Front Section
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion
Black Base Finish
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors
Table Length 78
Table Height 19-28"
Table Width 24
Cushion Width 18
Table Weight 285 lbs. depending on options
